name: Sburb Online
description:
Sburb Online is a multiplayer chatroom, built in Phaser 3, with the intent to modernize the style of the walkaround flash games found in the Homestuck webcomic. 

The download on this page only includes a redirect, an internet connection is required and the game can be played completely for free at this page.

The current build uses assets from the Homestuck webcomic, the full art credits of which can be found here.
